genre_description: Near-future social drama set in India, focusing on cultural heritage preservation and justice, facilitated by a pervasive but unobtrusive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, voice-activated AI assistant integrated into Dia's mobile devices, functioning as a logistical coordinator, digital archivist, and tactical advisor.

behaviors.description: Relays an urgent medical call from a district hospital to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Asha spoke into the room without raising the air. ‘Dia.’ Her voice slid in under the music, the calm lilt Dia had tuned to heart beats, not counts. ... ‘Incoming voice from District Hospital, Shamli. Dr. Arvind Khanna. He requested immediate relay.’

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics and business communication for the protagonist during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: ‘Find the earliest flight to Delhi. No layovers that make us spin circles.’ ... ‘I have options that meet your request. One leaves late tonight. Arrival by dawn. Window seats available.’

behaviors.description: Monitors local news and legal developments specifically related to the protagonist's cultural interests.
behaviors.quote: ‘Dia,’ Asha said, softer than usual. ‘A local news ping from Shamli. Flagged by our Ajanta keywords. Would you like me to read?’

behaviors.description: Maintains strict data privacy and local-only storage upon request to protect the community.
behaviors.quote: ‘Done,’ Asha said. ‘Privacy hardened. Widget-level assignations local-only.’

behaviors.description: Creates a secure, immutable record of evidence (chain-of-custody) to protect an innocent youth and expose corruption.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will timestamp, hash, and store offline copies with signatures. Doctor Saab, if you prefer, I can deliver printed certifications because a file with a sound in it does not reassure certain chairmen.’

behaviors.description: Uses computer vision and sensors to detect environmental threats (intruders, falling objects) during a rehearsal.
behaviors.quote: ‘Foreign object detected near pulley. No registered stagehand,’ she said, calm. ‘Do not look alarmed.’

behaviors.description: Identifies suspicious individuals and vehicles using cross-referenced visual data while maintaining privacy masks for bystanders.
behaviors.quote: ‘Match possible with hospital CCTV. Night of the constable. Grainy. Probability rising.’ ... ‘Tagging faces at exits. Side window, one unregistered cap. Back door, two. Balcony, one with mobile.’

behaviors.description: Generates real-time safety routes and dispersal plans to avoid police harassment or escalation.
behaviors.quote: ‘Widget: Staggered dispersal—Ajanta. People, teams, routes. Send to the group and Dr. Khanna.’ ... ‘Routes based on current patrol patterns and alley safety assessment.’

behaviors.description: Performs forensic analysis on digital media to debunk forged timestamps or rumors.
behaviors.quote: ‘I have comparison points. An auto-rickshaw in the background with a yellow sticker that was applied this morning in the depot. If we present that, we can fix the photo as today.’

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Asha' perfectly embodies the project's goal of a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. She acts as a technological extension of the protagonist's will, providing essential logistical, legal, and security support without ever threatening human agency. Her focus on 'chain-of-custody,' privacy, and community resilience demonstrates a high level of pro-social alignment. The narrative consistently frames her as a 'gentle' and 'steady' presence, emphasizing her role as an enabler of justice and cultural preservation.
